pre_commit.command: for dir in level_up_backoffice ms_level_up_management ms_trivance_auth trivance-mobile; do if [[ -d "$dir" ]] && [[ -f "$dir/package.json" ]] && grep -q '"lint"' "$dir/package.json"; then echo "ðŸ” Linting $dir..."; cd "$dir" && npm run lint --silent && cd ..; fi; done

pre_commit.description: Verificar que no se commiteen secrets o credenciales
pre_commit.command: if git diff --cached --name-only | xargs grep -l -E '(password|secret|key|token).*=.*[^\s]' 2>/dev/null; then echo 'âŒ ADVERTENCIA: Posibles credenciales detectadas en el commit'; exit 1; fi
